alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Northeast Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 10:03PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Garfield County through 1030 PM PDT... At 1002 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Pomeroy, or 21 miles east of Dayton, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pomeroy, Peola and Alder Thicket Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Northeast Blue Mountains
